Acknowledgment_Date__c.inlineHelpText: The date that you acknowledged this Opportunity.
Acknowledgment_Date__c.label: Acknowledgment Date

Acknowledgment_Status__c.inlineHelpText: The acknowledgement status of this Opportunity.
Acknowledgment_Status__c.label: Acknowledgment Status

Ask_Date__c.inlineHelpText: The date the donor was asked for this Donation. This may be different from the date you received it.
Ask_Date__c.label: Ask Date

Batch_Number__c.inlineHelpText: The batch that created this Opportunity. This field is automatically populated based on your Batch Number Settings in NPSP Settings.
Batch_Number__c.label: Batch Number

Closed_Lost_Reason__c.inlineHelpText: Notes on why the donation ask was not successful.
Closed_Lost_Reason__c.label: Closed Lost Reason

CommitmentId__c.inlineHelpText: External identifier for Salesforce.org payment service integration.
CommitmentId__c.label: Elevate Recurring Id

DisableContactRoleAutomation__c.inlineHelpText: When selected, this field disables several aspects of NPSP Opportunity Contact Role automation, potentially resulting in incorrect or duplicate data. Refer to the product documentation for more details.
DisableContactRoleAutomation__c.label: Disable Contact Role Automation

Fair_Market_Value__c.inlineHelpText: The Fair Market Value of an In-Kind gift.
Fair_Market_Value__c.label: Fair Market Value

Gift_Strategy__c.inlineHelpText: Categorizes the type of ask for this Opportunity, for example, New Donor.
Gift_Strategy__c.label: Gift Strategy

Grant_Contract_Date__c.inlineHelpText: The date of the Grant's inception, according to the document or contract sent by the grantmaking organization.
Grant_Contract_Date__c.label: Grant Contract Date

Grant_Contract_Number__c.inlineHelpText: Use this to track unique numbers sometimes assigned by grantmaking organizations.
Grant_Contract_Number__c.label: Grant Contract Number

Grant_Program_Area_s__c.inlineHelpText: Use this to describe the funding areas for the Grant or Donation. For example, the names of the programs the Grant or Donation is designated for.
Grant_Program_Area_s__c.label: Program Areas

Grant_Requirements_Website__c.inlineHelpText: A URL that points to the grant requirements on the grantmaker's website.
Grant_Requirements_Website__c.label: Grant Requirements Website

Honoree_Contact__c.inlineHelpText: Lookup to the Contact record of the honoree for this Donation.
Honoree_Contact__c.label: Honoree Contact

Honoree_Name__c.inlineHelpText: The honoree name as provided by the donor. If this field is left blank, and the Honoree Contact field contains a value, NPSP automatically populates this field with that value.
Honoree_Name__c.label: Honoree Name

In_Kind_Description__c.inlineHelpText: Holds any rich text description of the In-Kind Gift, including pictures.
In_Kind_Description__c.label: In-Kind Description

In_Kind_Donor_Declared_Value__c.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the donor provided the Fair Market Value for this In-Kind Gift.
In_Kind_Donor_Declared_Value__c.label: In-Kind Donor Declared Value

In_Kind_Type__c.inlineHelpText: The type of In-Kind Gift, for example, Goods or Services.
In_Kind_Type__c.label: In-Kind Type

Is_Grant_Renewal__c.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the Grant is a renewal of a previous Grant.
Is_Grant_Renewal__c.label: Is Grant Renewal

Matching_Gift_Account__c.inlineHelpText: Lookup to the Account record of the company that will match this Donation.
Matching_Gift_Account__c.label: Matching Gift Account

Matching_Gift_Employer__c.inlineHelpText: The name of the company that will match this Donation.
Matching_Gift_Employer__c.label: Matching Gift Employer

Matching_Gift_Status__c.inlineHelpText: The status of the Matching Gift for this Donation, for example, Submitted or Received.
Matching_Gift_Status__c.label: Matching Gift Status

Matching_Gift__c.inlineHelpText: Lookup to the Opportunity record for the Matching Gift for this Donation.
Matching_Gift__c.label: Matching Gift

Next_Grant_Deadline_Due_Date__c.inlineHelpText: The due date for this Opportunity's next Deliverable (read only).
Next_Grant_Deadline_Due_Date__c.label: Next Deliverable Date

Notification_Message__c.inlineHelpText: A personalized message for the notification recipient.
Notification_Message__c.label: Notification Message

Notification_Preference__c.inlineHelpText: Indicates how the notification recipient should be notified, for example, by email or phone.
Notification_Preference__c.label: Notification Preference

Notification_Recipient_Contact__c.inlineHelpText: Lookup to the Contact record of the person who should be notified about this Donation.
Notification_Recipient_Contact__c.label: Notification Recipient Contact

Notification_Recipient_Information__c.inlineHelpText: Enter any contact information such as address, phone, or email that the donor provided for the notification recipient.
Notification_Recipient_Information__c.label: Notification Recipient Information

Notification_Recipient_Name__c.inlineHelpText: The name that the donor provided of the person you should notify about this Donation. If this field is left blank and the Notification Recipient Contact field contains a value, NPSP automatically populates this field with that value.
Notification_Recipient_Name__c.label: Notification Recipient Name

Previous_Grant_Opportunity__c.inlineHelpText: If this Grant is a renewal of a previous Grant, use this field to relate this record to the previous Grant.
Previous_Grant_Opportunity__c.label: Previous Grant/Gift Opportunity

Primary_Contact_Campaign_Member_Status__.inlineHelpText: The status NPSP uses when it creates a Campaign Member for this Opportunity's Primary Contact and Primary Campaign Source. Leave blank to default to a responded status for Closed/Won Opportunities, and a non-responded status for other Opportunities.
Primary_Contact_Campaign_Member_Status__.label: Primary Contact Campaign Member Status

Primary_Contact__c.inlineHelpText: The Primary Contact for this Opportunity. If this is an individual Donation, NPSP attributes the Donation to the Primary Contact. If this is an organizational Donation, NPSP attributes a soft credit to the Primary Contact.
Primary_Contact__c.label: Primary Contact

Qualified_Date__c.inlineHelpText: The date your organization identified this donor as qualifying for this Donation.
Qualified_Date__c.label: Qualified Date

Recurring_Donation_Installment_Name__c.inlineHelpText: The installment name for inclusion in Opportunity naming. Shows the installment number in parentheses for open ended Recurring Donations, or the installment number out of the total for Recurring Donations with a set number of installments.
Recurring_Donation_Installment_Name__c.label: Recurring Donation Installment Name

Recurring_Donation_Installment_Number__c.inlineHelpText: The installment number of this Opportunity's Recurring Donation schedule.
Recurring_Donation_Installment_Number__c.label: Recurring Donation Installment Number

Requested_Amount__c.inlineHelpText: The amount you are requesting. This number might be different from the final award amount.
Requested_Amount__c.label: Requested Amount

Tribute_Type__c.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the Donation is in honor or in memory of an individual.
Tribute_Type__c.label: Tribute Type

npe01__Amount_Outstanding__c.inlineHelpText: Formula: The Amount of this Opportunity minus the Payment Writeoff Amount and Payment Amount Received.
npe01__Amount_Outstanding__c.label: Remaining Balance

npe01__Amount_Written_Off__c.inlineHelpText: Total value of the Payments marked as written-off or noncollectable for this Opportunity.
npe01__Amount_Written_Off__c.label: Payment Writeoff Amount

npe01__Contact_Id_for_Role__c.inlineHelpText: Hidden field for passing a Contact Id for Contact Role creation.
npe01__Contact_Id_for_Role__c.label: Contact Id for Role

npe01__Do_Not_Automatically_Create_Payme.inlineHelpText: If payments are active, and if checked, a new payment will not be automatically created for this Opportunity.
npe01__Do_Not_Automatically_Create_Payme.label: Do Not Automatically Create Payment

npe01__Is_Opp_From_Individual__c.inlineHelpText: Formula: Whether or not the related Account is defined as an individual (SYSTEMIsIndividual__c)
npe01__Is_Opp_From_Individual__c.label: Is Opp From Individual

npe01__Member_Level__c.inlineHelpText: Determines the value on the Contact or Account of the Last Membership Level field.
npe01__Member_Level__c.label: Member Level

npe01__Membership_Origin__c.inlineHelpText: Is this a renewal, a new membership, or a membership with someone who lapsed and has returned.
npe01__Membership_Origin__c.label: Membership Origin

npe01__Number_of_Payments__c.inlineHelpText: Total number of payments for this Opportunity (Donation)
npe01__Number_of_Payments__c.label: Number of Payments

npe01__Payments_Made__c.inlineHelpText: The total value of Payments marked as paid for this Opportunity.
npe01__Payments_Made__c.label: Payment Amount Received

npo02__CombinedRollupFieldset__c.inlineHelpText: Formula: Concatenated fields used during rollups to locate the most recent opportunity.
npo02__CombinedRollupFieldset__c.label: Combined Rollup Fieldset

npo02__systemHouseholdContactRoleProcess.inlineHelpText: Controls if Household contact roles are created for Opportunities.  DEPRECATED.  Replaced by custom settings.
npo02__systemHouseholdContactRoleProcess.label: _SYSTEM: HOUSEHOLD CONTACT ROLEPROCESSOR
